name: Force Blaster
description:
100% python made game - in programming

It is a reverse shooting game. 

You bounce a short distance from the mouse's opposite direction whenever you click to shoot.

The black rectangle (followed by mouse's rotation) on the player blocks bullets.

You have to kill all the enemies and the big boss, and dodge all the bombs to win the game.

There's help and instructions within the game.
